item.description:
The Intensive practice retreat

is a weekend of intense practice. Large portions of the Lotus Sutra are chanted along with prayers and prostrations. A special Sutra book which contains the whole Lotus Sutra in the Shindoku reading is needed for this retreat. The book is available at the Temple. This is a weekend of mostly focused practice with some study and lecture. Intensive retreats are open to anyone wanting to practice intensely, but beginners are asked to wait for a while of practice before attempting this kind of retreat. If your unsure please talk with Rev. Faulconer. You must be registered to join a retreat. To register please sign on to meetup (see link below) and go to the event date or call / email Rev. Faulconer. (617-314-7782) Registration closes the wednesday before the scheculded retreat, so register early. Space is limited. Fees cover meals and supplies.

We will begin Friday night and end around 2 pm on Sunday.
item.name: Intensive Retreat
